TopicTitle: Should squad release all older versions of KSP?

Articles.Content:
I'd love to go back and play .18 when things weren't so gray... When everything in the space center was white and red the perfect colors for the KSC.

I'd love to go back and play the other ones too.

Especially the ones without a runway... Those we're the old old ones.

I think you all would agree with me, It's good to have good old memories come back, Especially with the textures on the parts, Those fitted parts for rockets.

No, I dont wan't this.

Why? Who woulden't want this????

Atleast tell me why?
That's not very constructive, coolitic. Personally I wouldn't use it, but I'm not by any means against it. The only question is whether they still have them!

Back in Kerbalkon 2012 the devs mentioned the idea of selling a package of all the older versions of KSP, as well as the ones that were never released to the public (pre 0.9 I think). But my memory isn't great and this was over a year ago so the guys at Squad might have different plans in mind now.
I would Like Something Like this I wanna See .17 And go to Hot moho
I agree, older versions of the game should be available regardless of bugs, etc.

merry christmas

omg it may not be christmas but this is epic!!!! Thank you!
Personally, I'd like to have .17. Minecraft has the ability to chose older versions, and it's awesome, and useful for many reasons, such as mod compatibly and for old worlds.. KSP should have it too.
